snippet: The F.B.I.’s pursuit of the person or people who breached the Astros’ computer servers involved a trip through a shrouded corner of the Internet.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation determines that person or people linked to St Louis Cardinals hacking of Houston Astros database apparently used network of servers called Tor to hide sources.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I.’s pursuit of the person or people who breached the Astros’ computer servers involved a trip through a shrouded corner of the Internet.

headline.main: Hacking Inquiry Finds a Trail Despite Efforts to Cover It Up
headline.print_headline: Traces of Hacking Found Despite Efforts at Secrecy
